Ultra Luxury Denim Collection: Diego MilanoItalian Inspired and American Engineered > Diego Milano Jeans are designed in New York City & Manufactured in Scottsdale, AZ. Hand crafted and extremely original - We use only the finest Italian and American Materials. We are the only true original in the ultra luxury denim space. Blue Global Media is the World’s Leading Online Loan Marketplace. Every month our Premium Online Brands connect millions of Consumers and Businesses to quality credit providers. We match more businesses and consumers with financial products than anybody else. No one else can compete with our extensive reach or advanced loan matching algorithm, we simply are: “The World’s Online Loan Marketplace.”At the intersection of technology and marketing, BlueGlobalMedia is the powerful engine behind some of the Internet’s most famous financial brands. Our Mission is to democratize the access to credit for Businesses and Consumers. Our partners greatly benefit from our vast experience and dedicated team of technology and marketing professionals. Our Cost Per Action (CPA) model of advertising ensures we assume the risk of the media side; our partners ONLY pay for positive profitable results. We Generate Financial Loan Applications for: Personal LoansInstallment LoansSmall Dollar LoansCash Advance LoansPayday LoansCommercial LoansAuto LoansSBA LoansMCA LoansBusiness LoansMerchant Cash Advance LoansLines of CreditBusiness Term LoansRevenue Based FinancingHard Money LoansBridge LoansSub-Prime Residential Loans Who should work with Blue Global Media? Financial institutions large and small that are seeking to build customer portfolios and/or gain advanced data insight without the risk of online advertising. Traffic partners and Affiliates that are seeking increase their ROI to the highest level, and want the highest paying most comprehensive financial offers available anywhere.

February 11, 2016, Chris was a client of Neely’s

I have worked with Neely and her team for several months now and we have, over time, come to rely on the Culture Connective team for more and more support in different aspects of our business.  This team does so much for our organization, including recruiting for key positions and managing our human resources function. The beauty of this partnership is that Culture Connective is a one stop shop for small business support.  This team has saved me time and money, and has truly defined what business partnership should be."                        -Chris Kay, CEO of Blue Global Media
